snippet: William I. Koch, a billionaire industrialist and collector of rare wines, testified in Federal District Court in Manhattan against a dealer he says sold him a couple million dollars’ worth of counterfeit vintages.
abstract: William I Koch, billionaire industrialist and collector of rare wines, testifies in Federal District Court in Manhattan against Rudy Kurniawan, dealer he says sold him around $2 million worth of counterfeit vintages.
lead_paragraph: William I. Koch, a billionaire industrialist and collector of rare wines, testified in Federal District Court in Manhattan against a dealer he says sold him a couple million dollars’ worth of counterfeit vintages.

headline.main: A Koch Brother, on a Crusade Against Counterfeit Rare Wines, Takes the Stand
headline.print_headline: A Koch Brother, on a Crusade Against Counterfeit Rare Wines, Takes the Stand
